summary: An exploration of the clothes, the glamour and the decadence of iconic fashion designer Halston.
cast: Patricia Altschul|Phillip Bloch|Thom Browne|Stephen Burrows|Pat Cleveland|Bob Colacello|Richard DuPont|Robert Dupont|Amy Fine-Collins|Anthony Haden-Guest|Halston|Cathy Horyn|Victor Hugo|Anjelica Huston|Billy Joel|Randy Jones|Naeem Khan|Christopher Makos|Boaz Masur|Parick McMullen|Liza Minnelli|Georgette Mosbacher|Glenn O'Brien|Adam Rapoport|Andy Rapoport|Nile Rodgers|Chado Ralph Rucci|Whitney Smith|André Leon Talley|Diane von Fürstenberg|Paul Wilmot
title: Ultrasuede: In Search of Halston
